15#ifndef ISC_BIND9_H
16#define ISC_BIND9_H 1
17
18#include <stdbool.h>
19#include <isc/platform.h>
20
21/*
22 * This determines whether we are using the libisc/libdns libraries
23 * in BIND9 or in some other application. For BIND9 (named and related
24 * tools) it must be set to true at runtime. Export library clients
25 * will call isc_lib_register(), which will set it to false.
26 */
27LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern bool isc_bind9;
28
29#endif /* ISC_BIND9_H */
30
